title: Fields
content:
The Fields tab, which includes the Fields Editor, enables you to view, add, and edit fields for a record.

To access the Fields tab, from the main menu, select Administration > Configuration > Studio > Fields.

The tab displays the fields for the record type selected in the drop-down list at the top of the page.

Related topics

  • Field properties
  • How to create a field and add it to a record type
  • How to edit a field
  • Calculated fields
  • Calculated field templates
  • Generic relationship fields
  • Cross-record field mapping
